featured.text: Early this past summer the three whales were pronounced fit enough to be returned to the Atlantic Ocean.
In the Bermuda Triangle, a region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean, some airplanes and ships were reported to have mysteriously disappeared without a _____.

According to the passage, where is Zanzibar most likely located on the following map? North America Europe Asia ○ A Atlantic Pacific Pacific Ocean ○ Ocean C Ocean Africa South ○ B Indian America Ocean ○ D (A) A (B) B (C) C (D) D 45.

definition.zh_def: 大西洋的；與大西洋有關的
definition.example: The Atlantic coast is known for its beautiful beaches.
